title: Snowdown shop unlocked Challenger Ahri but I cant purchase... Why?
body:
I know that Challenger {{champion:103}}  is postponed to January but why cant I unlock it in snowdown shop right now since IT DID pop up. In a way I feel ripped off that I cant purchase her right now...

here is proof rito
http://i255.photobucket.com/albums/hh134/fira65/Challenger%20Ahri%20Denial.png

replies.body:
Thank you for your report, ShewT. I'll see if I can pass on this information to the Riot team and get you a response.

UPDATE: At this time, you're advised to submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support so that they can assist you further. You can do that on the Riot Games Support website at: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
